# Awesome Intune

> A curated directory of 85+ free, community-built tools for Microsoft Intune and endpoint management.

## About

Awesome Intune is the largest collection of free Microsoft Intune tools, PowerShell scripts, and automation resources. All tools are open-source and community-maintained. The directory helps IT professionals and system administrators discover utilities for device management, compliance, reporting, and automation.

Website: https://awesomeintune.com
GitHub: https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune

## Categories

### Automation Tools
Tools for automating Intune tasks, bulk operations, and scheduled workflows.
- IntuneManagement: Backup and restore Intune configurations
- Intune App Factory: Automated application packaging pipeline
- IntuneCD: Configuration as code for Intune
- Intune Toolkit: Collection of automation scripts
- AutopilotGroupTagger: Automate Autopilot group assignments
- Device Offboarding Manager: Automate device removal workflows
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/automation

### Troubleshooting Tools
Diagnostic utilities for resolving Intune deployment issues.
- Get-IntuneManagementExtensionDiagnostics: Debug IME issues
- Intune Debug Toolkit: Device-side troubleshooting
- Intune dsregcmd Analyzer: Parse device registration data
- SyncML Viewer: View device sync communication
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/troubleshooting

### Reporting Tools
Analytics and compliance reporting solutions.
- Intune Anomalies Report: Detect configuration anomalies
- Intune Change Tracking: Monitor configuration changes
- Insight: Advanced Intune reporting
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/reporting

### Security Tools
Device security and compliance utilities.
- MDE Validator: Validate Microsoft Defender for Endpoint
- RuleForge: Security policy management
- EasyDefenderMacOS: macOS Defender deployment
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/security

### Packaging Tools
Application packaging for Intune deployment.
- Intune Win32 App: Create Win32 app packages
- Intune Prep Tool: Prepare apps for deployment
- WinTuner: Package management for Intune
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/packaging

### Configuration Tools
Device settings and policy management.
- Intune Baselines: Security baseline templates
- Apple Device Policy Explorer: Browse Apple MDM policies
- Envoy: Configuration deployment tool
- IntuneDiff: Compare configurations across tenants
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/configuration

### Monitoring Tools
Device health and compliance monitoring.
- Fleetly: Fleet management dashboard
- Support Companion: End-user support tool
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/monitoring

### Migration Tools
Tools for MDM migration and tenant transfers.
- Intune Hydration Kit: Environment setup automation
URL: https://awesomeintune.com/tools/category/migration

## Popular Tools

1. IntuneManagement - Backup, restore, and document Intune configurations
2. Get-IntuneManagementExtensionDiagnostics - Comprehensive IME troubleshooting
3. Intune Debug Toolkit - Device-side debugging and diagnostics
4. WinTuner - Simplified Win32 app packaging
5. IntuneCD - GitOps for Intune configuration management

## FAQ

### What is Awesome Intune?
Awesome Intune is a curated directory of 85+ free, community-built tools for Microsoft Intune and endpoint management. It helps IT professionals discover PowerShell scripts, automation tools, and utilities for managing devices.

### Are all tools free?
Yes, all tools listed on Awesome Intune are free to use. Most are open-source and available on GitHub.

### How do I submit a tool?
Visit the GitHub repository at https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune and open a pull request or create an issue with your tool details.

### Who maintains Awesome Intune?
Awesome Intune is a community project maintained by Intune professionals and Microsoft MVPs.

## Links

- Homepage: https://awesomeintune.com
- All Tools: https://awesomeintune.com/tools
- GitHub Repository: https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune
- Submit a Tool: https://github.com/ugurkocde/awesomeintune/issues/new
